title: Prevent overlapping scheduled sync runs per integration connection (CRM/Support/Product Analytics)

sections.text: Scheduled sync jobs can overlap for the same connection, leading to skipped pages, partial ingestion, or rate-limit cascades across CRM, support, and product analytics integrations. Add a per-connection lock/lease (with TTL) so only one sync run can execute at a time, and ensure a safe release on completion/failure. If a run is already in progress, the scheduler should defer/skip with a clear reason for later diagnosis (leveraging existing observability work).
